actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 104-106.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 139.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to extend the deadlines applicable to certain hydroelectric projects under the Federal Power Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon certain licensees' request, to extend for up to three consecutive two-year periods the time required for commencement of construction of two specified hydroelectric projects.

titles.title: A bill to extend the deadlines applicable to certain hydroelectric projects under the Federal Power Act, and for other purposes.
